401:1: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram |
401:3: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante |
401:6: tatra na ca te rāgeṇa bādhyante |
401:13: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin suvarṇanāmaromavivare avabhāsaṃ nāma cintāmaṇiratnam |
401:46: ityevaṃ te mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ saṃvegamanuvicintya yadā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
401:54: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadā bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
401:57: sukhitāste sattvā ye kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
401:60: te idaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti |
401:63: na ca te khañjakubjakordhvanāsagaṇḍalamboṣṭhāśca sattvāḥ kuṣṭhinaśca santaḥ |
401:64: na ca teṣāṃ kāye vyādhiḥ saṃkramate |
401:71: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadā bhagavannidaṃ praśnamanirdiṣṭaṃ tadā devaputrāṇāmabhedyā śraddhotpannā |
401:74: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin kṛṣṇānnāma romavivarādavatīrya ratnakuṇḍalo nāma romavivaraḥ |
401:76: tāśca gandharvakanyā abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitaśarīrā apsarasāmiva pratispardhinyaḥ tādṛśyaḥ,
401:81: na ca tāsāṃ kāye kiṃcinmānuṣīduḥkhaṃ saṃvidyate |
401:89: evameva te kulaputra romavivarā agrāhyā asaṃsparśāḥ |
401:90: teṣu romavivareṣu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ romavivarāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi paribhramitaḥ,
401:91: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāṇi |
401:95: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat– yadā bhagavan samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi paribhramatā,
401:96: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāni,
401:97: asyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśataṃ tenāpi na dṛṣṭam,
401:100: mayāpi tasya romavivaraṃ vīkṣamāṇena parimārgayamāṇena na dṛśyate |
401:104: śatasahasrabhujaḥ koṭiśatasahasranetro viśvarūpī ekādaśaśīrṣaḥ mahāyogī nirvāṇabhūmivyavasthitaḥ sucetano mahāprājñaḥ bhavottārakaḥ kulīno'nādarśī prājño nirdeśastathācchāyābhūtaḥ sarvadharmeṣu,
401:105: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo na śruto na kenacid dṛśyate |
401:108: acintyo'yaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prātihāryāṇi samupadarśayati |
401:113: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kenopāyena bhagavan paśyāmi ahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
401:114: bhagavānāha– yadi kulaputra ihaiva sahālokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
401:119: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ–kiṃ mayā pāparatena cirakālajīvikayā tenāvalokiteśvaradarśanaviprahīṇenāndhabhūtena tamonuprāptamārgasaṃprasthitena?
401:120: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat–katamasmin kāle bhagavannavalokiteśvara āgacchati ?
401:123: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra tato romavivarādavatīrya amṛtabindurnāma romavivaraḥ,
401:135: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin asminnamṛtabindau romavivare ṣaṣṭiparvatāḥ suvarṇarūpyamayāḥ |
401:140: ye tasmin romavivare satatasamitaṃ nirnāditaṃ sūryaṃ dhārayati |
401:141: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmiṃścāmṛtabindau romavivare anekāni vimānakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnaparikhacitāni śobhanīyāni darśanīyāni vicitrāṇi muktāhāraśatasahasrāṇi pralambitāni |
401:142: teṣu vimāneṣu bodhisattvā viśramitvā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti |
401:144: caṃkrame caṃkrame saptati saptati puṣkariṇyaḥ kecidaṣṭāṅgopetena vāriṇā paripūrṇāḥ,
401:147: teṣu caṃkrameṣu manoramāḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ lohitavarṇāḥ suvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitā maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitāḥ keyūrapralambitāḥ |
401:155: evameva sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmin romavivare īdṛśā bodhisattvā vasanti |
401:159: satatakālaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ ekāgradharmamaitrīvihārikāḥ kṣāntisaṃbhāvitā nirvāṇacintakāḥ saṃvegamānuṣyakāḥ |
401:163: īdṛśāni ca tatra kulaputra romavivare saddharmanimittāni ca dṛśyante |
401:175: evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā svakasvakāni caṃkramaṇāni caṃkramanti|
401:177: teṣu caṃkrameṣu sāmantakeṣu kalpavṛkṣā lohitadaṇḍāḥ sauvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitāḥ maulikuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitā ratnahārapralambitāḥ|
401:198: evameva kulaputra kinnarā dharmābhiratāḥ satatakālamavalokiteśvarasya nāmanusmaranti|
401:201: evaṃ durlabhaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūtaḥ sarvasattveṣvabhayaṃdadaḥ |
401:210: teṣāṃ teṣu romavivareṣu tāvattiṣṭhanti yāvannairvāṇikīṃ bhūmimanveṣante ||
